content:
The chunk appears within a method called `popupControls` that creates a Tkinter-based control panel for an interval player. The code defines buttons (`<<`, `Play`, `Stop`, and `>>`) to control playback, with functions to pause, resume, jump to start/end, and update a slider displaying the current time.

s.pause()
        jumpToStart = tkinter.Button(bf, text = '<<', command = toStart)
        # Stop/play buttons
        def doPlay(s=self, es=es):
            s.resume(es.get())
